page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: Most of the children in Pennington play on the Common,where there are some slides and some swings.There is also a Sports Field nearby where local football matches are played.Recently a B.M.X track was designed for the Common.Not far from the village is Rookes Gardens,a park which has an adventure playground.Everton has a recreation ground where local football matches are played.The Sports Ground near the Fire Station in Lymington was the proposed site for a Sports Centre for Lymington but the idea was turned down. Every year the Fair and the Circus visit Pennington Common. Local beaches are an attraction for local and visiting people in summer.Yachting and visits to The Isle of Wight and abroad are also popular.
